title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, caste, color, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others‚Äô private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement codeofconduct@posit.co. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.1, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired [Mozilla‚Äôs code conduct enforcement ladder][https://github.com/mozilla/inclusion]. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

title: Contributing to glyread
text: can fix typos, spelling mistakes, grammatical errors documentation directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. generally means ‚Äôll need edit roxygen2 comments .R, .Rd file. can find .R file generates .Rd reading comment first line.

title: Contributing to glyread
text: want make bigger change, ‚Äôs good idea first file issue make sure someone team agrees ‚Äôs needed. ‚Äôve found bug, please file issue illustrates bug minimal reprex (also help write unit test, needed). See guide create great issue advice.

title: Contributing to glyread
text: Fork package clone onto computer. haven‚Äôt done , recommend using usethis::create_from_github("glycoverse/glyread", fork = TRUE). Install development dependencies devtools::install_dev_deps(), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn‚Äôt pass cleanly, ‚Äôs good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using usethis::pr_init("brief-description--change"). Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(), following prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md (.e.¬†just first header). Follow style described https://style.tidyverse.org/news.html.

title: Contributing to glyread
text: New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don‚Äôt restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. use testthat unit tests. Contributions test cases included easier accept.

title: Contributing to glyread
text: Please note glyread project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project agree abide terms.

what: One function, two files ‚Äî that‚Äôs it
title: Get Started with glyread
text: Getting started straightforward. First, pick function matches identification software. glyread currently plays nicely popular tools: Byonic (quantification Byologic): read_byonic_byologic() Byonic (quantification pGlycoQuant): read_byonic_pglycoquant() Peaks GlycanFinder: read_glycan_finder() Glyco-Decipher: read_glyco_decipher() MSFragger-Glyco: read_msfragger() pGlyco3 (built-quantification): read_pglyco3() pGlyco3 (quantification pGlycoQuant): read_pglyco3_pglycoquant() StrucGP (quantification): read_strucgp() Next, gather two input files. File 1: Results file output identification software. read_*() function expects specific file format, check function documentation ensure ‚Äôre selecting right one. File 2: Sample information (CSV) simple two-column table tells glyread experimental design: sample: Sample names appear results file (order flexible) group: Experimental conditions, treatments, groupings (recommended column name, flexibility ) Pro tip: Quality control samples labeled ‚ÄúQC‚Äù group column ‚Äî helps downstream analysis recognize appropriately.

title: Get Started with glyread
text: files ready, importing data one-liner. ‚Äôs practical example: suppose used pGlyco3 identification pGlycoQuant quantification, results pglyco3_result.csv sample details samples.csv: ‚Äôs ‚Äî data now ready analysis tidy experiment() object.

title: Get Started with glyread
text: read_*() function quirks options ‚Äî file format variations, optional parameters, output customizations. Check function-specific documentation ?read_pglyco3 (whichever function matches workflow) fine-tune data import. Happy glyco-analyzing! üç¨

text: Getting started: Reference:

title: Read and process glycomics and glycoproteomics data
text: glyread entry point glycoverse ecosystem. provides unified interface reading processing data various glycomics glycoproteomics software, converting glyexp::experiment() object analysis.

title: Read and process glycomics and glycoproteomics data
text: Used pGlyco3 pGlycoQuant glycopeptide identification quantification? Try read_pglyco3_pglycoquant()!
code: library(glyread)  exp <- read_pglyco3_pglycoquant(   "path/to/pGlyco3-pGlycoQuant/result/Quant.spectra.list",   sample_info = "path/to/sample_info.csv",   quant_method = "label-free",   glycan_type = "N" )

what: glyread: Read and process glycomics and glycoproteomics data ‚Äî glyread-package
title: glyread: Read and process glycomics and glycoproteomics data ‚Äî glyread-package
text: Provides unified interface reading processing quantification results various glycomics glycoproteomics software tools, including Byonic (ByoLogic, pGlycoQuant), StrucGP, pGlyco3 (pGlycoQuant), Glyco-Decipher, GlyHunter, MSFragger. package standardizes raw data different sources, performs peptide-spectrum match (PSM) aggregation, parses glycan compositions structures, converts data standardized experiment object 'glyexp' package downstream analysis within glycoverse ecosystem.

title: glyread: Read and process glycomics and glycoproteomics data ‚Äî glyread-package
text: Maintainer: Bin Fu 23110220018@m.fudan.edu.cn (ORCID)

title: Read Byonic-Byologic result ‚Äî read_byonic_byologic
text: used Byonic intact glycopeptide identification, used Byologic quantification, function . reads result file returns glyexp::experiment() object. Currently label-free quantification supported.

title: Read Byonic-Byologic result ‚Äî read_byonic_byologic
code: read_byonic_byologic(   fp,   sample_info = NULL,   quant_method = "label-free",   glycan_type = "N",   sample_name_converter = NULL,   orgdb = "org.Hs.eg.db" )

title: Read Byonic-Byologic result ‚Äî read_byonic_byologic
text: fp File path pGlycoQuant result file. sample_info File path sample information file (csv), sample information data.frame/tibble. quant_method Quantification method. Either "label-free" "TMT". glycan_type Glycan type. One "N", "O-GalNAc", "O-GlcNAc", "O-Man", "O-Fuc", "O-Glc". Default "N". sample_name_converter function convert sample names file paths. function take character vector old sample names return new sample names. Note sample names sample_info match new names. NULL, original names kept. orgdb name OrgDb package use UniProt gene symbol conversion. Default "org.Hs.eg.db".

title: Read Byonic-Byologic result ‚Äî read_byonic_byologic
text: glyexp::experiment() object.

title: Read Byonic-Byologic result ‚Äî read_byonic_byologic
text: Open .blgc file result folder PMI-Byos. "Peptide List" panel (usually bottom right), click "Export content table CSV file" button. exported .csv file file use.

title: Read Byonic-Byologic result ‚Äî read_byonic_byologic
text: Multisite glycopeptides supported protein_site set NA since exact site glycosylation determined unambiguously.

title: Read Byonic-Byologic result ‚Äî read_byonic_byologic
text: following columns found variable information tibble: peptide: character, peptide sequence peptide_site: integer, site glycosylation peptide protein: character, protein accession protein_site: integer, site glycosylation protein gene: character, gene name (symbol) glycan_composition: glyrepr::glycan_composition(), glycan compositions.

title: Read Byonic-Byologic result ‚Äî read_byonic_byologic
text: sample information file csv file first column named sample, rest columns sample information. sample column must match RawName column pGlyco3 result file, although order can different. can put useful information sample information file. Recommended columns : group: grouping conditions, e.g. "control" "tumor", required downstream analyses batch: batch information, required batch effect correction

title: Read Byonic-Byologic result ‚Äî read_byonic_byologic
text: pGlyco3 performs quantification PSM level. level information detailed downstream analyses. function aggregate PSMs glycopeptides summation. glycopeptide (unique combination "peptide", "peptide_site", "protein", "protein_site", "gene", "glycan_composition", "glycan_structure"), sum quantifications PSMs belong glycopeptide.

title: Read Byonic-pGlycoQuant result ‚Äî read_byonic_pglycoquant
text: used Byonic intact glycopeptide identification, used pGlycoQuant quantification, function . reads pGlycoQuant result file returns glyexp::experiment() object. Currently label-free quantification supported.

title: Read Byonic-pGlycoQuant result ‚Äî read_byonic_pglycoquant
code: read_byonic_pglycoquant(   fp,   sample_info = NULL,   quant_method = "label-free",   glycan_type = "N",   sample_name_converter = NULL,   orgdb = "org.Hs.eg.db",   parse_structure = TRUE )

title: Read Byonic-pGlycoQuant result ‚Äî read_byonic_pglycoquant
text: fp File path pGlycoQuant result file. sample_info File path sample information file (csv), sample information data.frame/tibble. quant_method Quantification method. Either "label-free" "TMT". glycan_type Glycan type. One "N", "O-GalNAc", "O-GlcNAc", "O-Man", "O-Fuc", "O-Glc". Default "N". sample_name_converter function convert sample names file paths. function take character vector old sample names return new sample names. Note sample names sample_info match new names. NULL, original names kept. orgdb name OrgDb package use UniProt gene symbol conversion. Default "org.Hs.eg.db". parse_structure Logical. Whether parse glycan structures. TRUE, glycan structures parsed included var_info glycan_structure column. FALSE (default), structure parsing skipped structure-related columns removed.

title: Read Byonic-pGlycoQuant result ‚Äî read_byonic_pglycoquant
text: glyexp::experiment() object.

title: Read glyco-decipher output ‚Äî read_glyco_decipher
text: Glyco-Decipher reports uncertain sites proteins. function automatically performs protein inference using parsimony method find leader proteins. ensures glycopeptide uniquely mapped single protein, gene, glycosite. Besides, uncertain sites proteins assigned NA.

title: Read glyco-decipher output ‚Äî read_glyco_decipher
text: following columns found variable information tibble: protein: character, protein accession (protein inference) protein_site: integer, site glycosylation protein (protein inference) gene: character, gene name (symbol) (protein inference) glycan_composition: glyrepr::glycan_composition(), glycan compositions.

title: Read glyco-decipher output ‚Äî read_glyco_decipher

Recommended columns : group: grouping conditions, e.g. "control" "tumor", required downstream analyses batch: batch information, required batch effect correction

title: Read pGlyco3 result ‚Äî read_pglyco3
text: pGlyco3 performs quantification PSM level. level information detailed downstream analyses. function aggregate PSMs glycopeptides summation. glycopeptide (unique combination "peptide", "peptide_site", "protein", "protein_site", "gene", "glycan_composition", "glycan_structure"), sum quantifications PSMs belong glycopeptide.

title: Read pGlyco3 result ‚Äî read_pglyco3
text: pGlyco3 reports "plausible structure" glycan. can set parse_structure = TRUE parse structures "glycan_structure" column glyrepr::glycan_structure() vector. However, please take caution structures, pGlyco3 strict quality control glycan structure annotations.

title: Read pGlyco3-pGlycoQuant result ‚Äî read_pglyco3_pglycoquant
text: fp File path pGlycoQuant result file. sample_info File path sample information file (csv), sample information data.frame/tibble. quant_method Quantification method. Either "label-free" "TMT". glycan_type Glycan type. One "N", "O-GalNAc", "O-GlcNAc", "O-Man", "O-Fuc", "O-Glc". Default "N". sample_name_converter function convert sample names file paths. function take character vector old sample names return new sample names. Note sample names sample_info match new names. NULL, original names kept. parse_structure Logical. Whether parse glycan structures. TRUE, glycan structures parsed included var_info glycan_structure column. FALSE (default), structure parsing skipped structure-related columns removed.

title: Read pGlyco3-pGlycoQuant result ‚Äî read_pglyco3_pglycoquant
text: glyexp::experiment() object.

title: Read pGlyco3-pGlycoQuant result ‚Äî read_pglyco3_pglycoquant
text: use "Quant.spectra.list" file pGlycoQuant result folder. Files pGlyco3 result folder needed. instructions use pGlyco3 pGlycoQuant, please refer manual: pGlycoQuant.

title: Read pGlyco3-pGlycoQuant result ‚Äî read_pglyco3_pglycoquant
text: following columns found variable information tibble: peptide: character, peptide sequence peptide_site: integer, site glycosylation peptide protein: character, protein accession (protein inference) protein_site: integer, site glycosylation protein (protein inference) gene: character, gene name (symbol) (protein inference) glycan_composition: glyrepr::glycan_composition(), glycan compositions. glycan_structure: glyrepr::glycan_structure(), glycan structures (parse_structure = TRUE).

title: Read pGlyco3-pGlycoQuant result ‚Äî read_pglyco3_pglycoquant
text: sample information file csv file first column named sample, rest columns sample information. sample column must match RawName column pGlyco3 result file, although order can different. can put useful information sample information file. Recommended columns : group: grouping conditions, e.g. "control" "tumor", required downstream analyses batch: batch information, required batch effect correction

title: Read pGlyco3-pGlycoQuant result ‚Äî read_pglyco3_pglycoquant
text: pGlyco3 reports protein groups. , shared glycopeptides reported group proteins separated ";". function automatically performs protein inference using parsimony method find leader proteins. ensures glycopeptide uniquely mapped single protein, gene, glycosite.

title: Read pGlyco3-pGlycoQuant result ‚Äî read_pglyco3_pglycoquant
text: pGlyco3 performs quantification PSM level. level information detailed downstream analyses. function aggregate PSMs glycopeptides summation. glycopeptide (unique combination "peptide", "peptide_site", "protein", "protein_site", "gene", "glycan_composition", "glycan_structure"), sum quantifications PSMs belong glycopeptide.

title: Read pGlyco3-pGlycoQuant result ‚Äî read_pglyco3_pglycoquant
text: pGlyco3 reports "plausible structure" glycan. can set parse_structure = TRUE parse structures "glycan_structure" column glyrepr::glycan_structure() vector. However, please take caution structures, pGlyco3 strict quality control glycan structure annotations.

what: Read the result from StrucGP ‚Äî read_strucgp
title: Read the result from StrucGP ‚Äî read_strucgp
text: StrucGP software intact glycopeptide identification. StrucGP support quantification, function returns glyexp::experiment() object binary (0/1) expression matrix indicating whether glycopeptide identified sample.

title: Read the result from StrucGP ‚Äî read_strucgp
code: read_strucgp(fp, sample_info = NULL, glycan_type = "N", parse_structure = TRUE)

title: Read the result from StrucGP ‚Äî read_strucgp
text: fp File path StrucGP result file. sample_info File path sample information file (csv), sample information data.frame/tibble. NULL (default), simple sample information tibble created. glycan_type Glycan type. One "N", "O-GalNAc", "O-GlcNAc", "O-Man", "O-Fuc", "O-Glc". Default "N". parse_structure Logical. Whether parse glycan structures. TRUE (default), glycan structures parsed included var_info glycan_structure column. FALSE, structure parsing skipped structure column removed.

title: Read the result from StrucGP ‚Äî read_strucgp
text: glyexp::experiment() object binary (0/1) expression matrix, 1 indicates glycopeptide identified sample 0 indicates .

title: Read the result from StrucGP ‚Äî read_strucgp
text: following columns found variable information tibble: peptide: character, peptide sequence protein: character, protein accession gene: character, gene name (symbol) protein_site: integer, site glycosylation protein glycan_composition: glyrepr::glycan_composition(), glycan compositions. glycan_structure: glyrepr::glycan_structure(), glycan structures (parse_structure = TRUE).

title: Read the result from StrucGP ‚Äî read_strucgp
text: sample information file csv file first column named sample, rest columns sample information. sample column must match file_name column StrucGP result file, although order can different. can put useful information sample information file. Recommended columns : group: grouping conditions, e.g. "control" "tumor", required downstream analyses batch: batch information, required batch effect correction

title: glyread 0.9.0
text: Add read_glycan_finder() import glycoproteomics results Peaks GlycanFinder (#6).

title: glyread 0.8.4
text: Variable IDs read_xxx() functions now standardized using meaningful names (e.g., P13674-N259-Hex(4)HexNAc(4)dHex(3)NeuAc(1)) instead generic IDs (e.g., GP1). read_pglyco3() now correctly converts ‚ÄúJ‚Äù ‚ÄúN‚Äù peptide column pGlyco3 output.

title: glyread 0.8.3
text: glycan_type parameter now supports ‚ÄúO-GalNAc‚Äù, ‚ÄúO-GlcNAc‚Äù, ‚ÄúO-Man‚Äù, ‚ÄúO-Fuc‚Äù, ‚ÄúO-Glc‚Äù. ‚ÄúO‚Äù valid value anymore. consistent update introduced glyexp 0.10.2.

title: glyread 0.8.2
text: glyread now depends CRAN version glyparse.

title: glyread 0.8.1
text: glyread now depends CRAN version glyrepr.

title: glyread 0.8.0
text: read_strucgp() now 0/1 expression matrix, indicating whether glycopeptide identified sample. read_strucgp() now performs protein inference automatically resolve protein ambiguity.

title: glyread 0.8.0
text: Protein inference algorithm optimized performance.

title: glyread 0.7.0
text: read_strucgp() redesigned new API. now returns [glyexp::experiment()] object instead tibble, consistent read_xxx() functions. StrucGP doesn‚Äôt support quantification, expression matrix filled NA values.

title: glyread 0.6.3
text: Fix bug read_strucgp() glycan compositions ‚ÄúNeuGc‚Äù parsed. Fix bug read_strucgp() glycan structures additional modifications (e.g.¬†‚Äú+Ammonium(+17)‚Äù) parsed. Fix bug read_strucgp() sample information included result tibble.

title: glyread 0.6.2
text: Fix bugs introduced breaking changes glyexp 0.10.0.

title: glyread 0.6.1
text: Update dependencies depend release versions glycoverse packages.

title: glyread 0.6.0
text: Add read_strucgp() read results StrucGP. Add read_glyco_decipher() read results Glyco-Decipher.

title: glyread 0.6.0
text: read_byonic_byologic() read_byonic_pglycoquant() drop glycopeptides uncertain sites anymore. Instead, fill ‚Äúprotein_site‚Äù column NA glycopeptides.

title: glyread 0.5.0
text: Add parse_structure parameter read_pglyco3() read_pglyco3_pglycoquant(). FALSE (default), glycan structure strings parsed, ‚Äúglycan_structure‚Äù column variable information tibble. improves performance structure-based analysis needed, avoids implicitly implying structures given pGlyco3 accurate. Well, .

title: glyread 0.5.0
text: read_pglyco3() read_pglyco3_pglycoquant() now correctly parse ‚ÄúpH‚Äù ‚ÄúaH‚Äù monosaccharides glycan compositions glycan structures. Messages protein inference changes ‚ÄúPerforming protein inference‚Äù ‚ÄúFinding leader proteins‚Äù better illustrate actually happening. Relavent documentations also updated. Add ‚ÄúVaraible information‚Äù section documentations functions. includes descriptions columns variable information tibble. Fix bug Uniprot isomers (‚ÄúO75882-2‚Äù) parsed correctly.

title: glyread 0.4.2
text: Remove redundant emoji ‚ÄúGetting Started‚Äù vignette.

title: glyread 0.4.1
text: Add ‚ÄúGetting Started‚Äù vignette.

title: glyread 0.4.0
text: big update! addition several new workflows supported, redesign API make read_xxx() functions behave consistently. Now read_xxx() functions try return experiments similar variable information format. ensure , functions perform protein inference automatically resolve protein ambiguity, functions add ‚Äúgene‚Äù column mapping protein accessions gene symbols. Besides, read_xxx() functions now aggregate quantification PSM glycopeptide level. Detailed list: Add read_pglyco3() read results pGlyco3 (built-quantification). Add read_byonic_byologic() read results Byonic Byologic quantification. functions now automatically perform PSM aggregation ensure glycopeptide-level quantification. Redesign read_msfragger() support multiple PSM files. awkward manul post-processing needed anymore.

title: glyread 0.4.0
text: Remove protein_inference_method parameter read_pglyco3_pglycoquant(). function now performs ‚Äúparsimony‚Äù protein inference algorithm. Optimize logic protein inference. ties, alphabetical order used.

title: glyread 0.3.2
text: Use AnnotationDbi::mapIds() convert protein IDs gene symbols. Remove clusterProfiler Suggests.

title: glyread 0.3.2
text: Try fix R CMD check errors Github Actions.

title: glyread 0.3.1
text: read_byonic_pglycoquant() now perform gene symbol conversion clusterProfiler specified OrgDb package (e.g., org.Hs.eg.db) installed. , gene column omitted message shown. improves robustness minimal CI environments. clusterProfiler org.Hs.eg.db now listed Suggests, Imports.

title: glyread 0.3.0
text: Add read_byonic_pglycoquant() reading results Byonic identification pGlycoQuant quantification. Add read_msfragger() reading results MSFragger-Glyco. read_pglyco3_pglycoquant() now performs protein inference automatically resolve protein ambiguity. means, variable information tibble now contains ‚Äúprotein‚Äù, ‚Äúgene‚Äù, ‚Äúprotein_site‚Äù columns. previous ambiguous ‚Äúproteins‚Äù, ‚Äúgenes‚Äù, ‚Äúprotein_sites‚Äù columns removed.

title: glyread 0.2.1
text: ‚Äúproteins‚Äù column read_pglyco3_pglycoquant() now contains protein uniprot accessions, e.g.¬†‚ÄúP08185‚Äù. multiple proteins exist, separated semicolon, e.g.¬†‚ÄúP08185;P04196‚Äù.
